TextView.android:text: BlackPlayer always tries its best to keep a backup of your Playlists as .m3ubackup files stored in the BlackPlayer/Playlists folder. If you are using the 'Build in Android library' the Playlists are stored in a database on your phone, which your phone manages. If you are using 'BlackPlayer Custom Library', the playlists are stored in the app. If you clear the App-data of BlackPlayer these playlists might be lost if there is no external m3u playlist file or m3uBackup file. Check which Audio library you are using in Metadata Settings category.
